thread.title: Fantastic Freddie hits the gym six days a week aged 80
thread.title_full: Fantastic Freddie hits the gym six days a week aged 80

title: Fantastic Freddie hits the gym six days a week aged 80
text:
20 February 2017 at 5:30pm Fantastic Freddie hits the gym six days a week aged 80 80-year-old Freddie is an inspiration to even the instructors 
Fitness fanatic Freddie, labelled "one of the biologically elite", hits the gym six times a week...at 80-years-old! 
It's something he's been doing most of life, he even reckons he's got a life fit for a prince. 
He told ITV News: "I live just across the road from the gym. I can stroll out, feed the birds and go in the gym. You can't ask for a better life, better than Prince Charles!" 
He starts his day at 7am with pre-workout protein shake, before starting his split routine to condition his muscles. Play video 
It's the discipline and challenge that drives Jersey man Freddie on, something which has impressed even his gym instructors. 
One says he's filmed Freddie doing full chin lifts with a 12kg dumbbell on the back of his belt and calls him "an inspiration". Play video 
Even his GP says Freddie isn't "an average 80-year-old", calling him "biologically elite". 
He's managed to avoid many of the health problems most elderly people face, his doctor puts it down to his life-long healthy attitude.
